result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shomari T Banks

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Shomari T Banks appeared by video.  Attorney Gary Raymond George Aty appeared by video for Shomari T Banks.  Attorney Arthur Kenneth Thexton in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for status conference.
Competency evaluation by private Doctor Bohn's report dated 9/19/2022 received and filed. Dr. Collins report previously received and filed on 6/21/2022.
Defense challenging findings of Dr. Collins' report.  Hearing date selected with the parties. Wisconsin Forensic Unit notified. Court grants Dr. Collins to appear by Zoom.
Defense requests' Doctor Bohn's report be sealed. Court grants requests and orders document labeled #24 SEALED.
Case adjourned for competency hearing in Branch 30.
Competency hearing scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.
The original document was titled: Medical Records w coversheet
The original history event date is: 10-17-2022
Medical Report and Records by Dr. Bohn at Milwaukee Health Services, filed.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Supervision Report, filed.
Case scheduled for status conference. Court ordered case rescheduled. Defense counsel notified of new status date 10-18-2022 at 9:00 am by email.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report

Defendant Shomari T Banks appeared by video.  Attorney Gary Raymond George appeared by video for Shomari T Banks.  Prosecuting attorney Sarah Dahdouh in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status conference. Defense informs the court the appointment for a competency evaluation by a private doctor was cancelled. Discussion held. Court will allow time for defendant to complete a new evaluation. Return on doctor's report to be scheduled after the next hearing. Case adjourned for a status conference.
Status conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report Received and Filed.
Email from Dr. Williams regarding evaluation costs, filed.
to Court regarding Dr. Williams email from Defense, filed.

Defendant Shomari T Banks in court with attorney Gary Raymond George.  Sarah Dahdouh appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Shomari T Banks appeared by video means with Attorney.
Case in court for a hearing on income eligiblity for examination.  
Defense counsel informs the court that the defendant has retained Dr. Williams for an independent evaluation. Discussion held regarding costs of evaluation. Defense requests the examination to be at the court's expense.
Court orders the competency evaluation to be conducted by Dr. Williams at county expense. The evaluation is scheduled for 9/1/2022. Court instructed defense counsel to provide Dr. Williams' availability at the next court date.
Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 30.
This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.  Status conference scheduled for September 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Supervision Report, filed.
Status conference on August 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Shomari T Banks in court with attorney Gary Raymond George.  Sarah Dahdouh appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a return on doctor's report. Defense informs the court that the defendant is seeking an independent evaluation. Discussion held regarding costs of evaluation. Defense requests the examination to be at the court's expense.
Court adjourned case for a hearing on income eligiblity for examination and scheduled an evidentary hearing.  Status conference scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.  Hearing scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report, received and filed
Received and Filed.

Defendant Shomari T Banks in court with attorney Gary Raymond George.  Brandon Schwebler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a return on doctor's report. Competency report filed and given to parties. Case passed to allow time for defense to discuss with client.
Case recalled at 9:37. State does not object to the findings of the report. Defendant claims to be incompetent. Defense challenges the report. Defense needs time to obtain information about client.
Defense counsel stated that Dr. Williams will conduct an examination and draft the report.
Court ordered matter adjourned.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for August 5, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Received and Filed.
JusticePoint Supervision Report, filed.

Defendant Shomari T Banks in court with attorney Gary Raymond George.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Shomari T Banks appeared by video means with Attorney.
Case in court for Doctor's report return. Letter filed by the forensic unit addressed on the record. Defendant is out of custody, evaluation rescheduled.  Order for Competency, signed and filed. Defendant has scheduled appointment with Dr Collins on 06/13/2022  at 11:00am, Room 504 Safety Building. Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 30. Doctor's Report Return is scheduled on June 21, 2022 at 9:00am.

22RM025224  Actual Date Bond Posted with *Sheriffs 5/12/2022

Defendant Shomari T Banks in court with attorney Gary Raymond George.  Defendant Shomari T Banks in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/ LIVE STREAMING THROUGH DACAST. Case in court for bail review hearing. 
Court is advised by the defense there is reason to believe the defendant is not competent to proceed.  Pursuant to Sec. 971.14 (2) Wisconsin Statutes, Court found probable cause and ordered defendant examined by the Forensic Unit.  Order for Examination, signed and filed.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for May 19, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Adjustment Number: 22A 043951,
Payable Number: 1004964,
Receipt Number: 22RP018436,
Amount: $20.00
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Shomari T Banks in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Shomari T Banks in custody.  Emily S Zimmel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Shomari T Banks appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Case retabbed due to offense date of 22CM1080.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for May 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.
